Package org.sfu.MotaGame.Bean

Class Board

java.lang.Object
org.sfu.MotaGame.Bean.Board
public class Board
extends Object
Board This class deals with initializing and rendering all necessary game objects, using an integer array as input for reference.
Since:
2020-03-18
Version:
1.0
Author:
Christopher Kassner, Alim Nizari, Thomas Chiu, Yuzhuo Ye
